body:
We’ve sent you an email with instructions to start your application.

This can take a few minutes to arrive.

If you don’t get an email: 
 * check your spam or junk folders
 * check you have entered the correct email
 * [resend the email](email_resent) 

For your security, we won't be able to save your information if you don’t follow the instructions in the email within 30 minutes.
heading: Check your email
